If you like Soundwave can rise again just give me permission to 
desacrate his gravesight (If he has one) and let me know where it is.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Striderzero, its fine with me.  In fact, it would have been 
pretty cool 
> if Soundwave were alive to see Koj and wonder if he should fight 
this 
> traitor, or befriend him in the name of peace!
> 
> :::The Skyscorchers:::
> 
> ::The Skyscorchers, with heavy sparks, pick up there fallen 
comrade, and 
> walked to Vulois' position::
> Afterburner: How do we go about doing this?  Back in the old war, 
we barely 
> had time to mourn, much less bury, our fallen comrades.
